details.songOfAdoration: It Is Well with My Soul #410

specialMusic.title: Yet Not I, but Through Christ in Me

list: The WMU will meet tomorrow evening at 6:00 PM in the Fellowship Hall.
The Eliza Broadus state mission offering goal is $2,500.

We will meet at Rawlings-Stinson park for our Sunday evening service on September 22. Last Sunday night was our best ever turnout for an outdoor service and we had a wonderful meeting! So, plan to come and bring a lawn chair (or two).
If you are interested in helping host a booth at Shaping Clay Jubilee (Oct. 4-5) similar to what we had at the Manchester Music Festival, please see Ryan (looking for ideas!).

We will hold a treat giveaway in the lawn during county trick or treat hours (likely Thursday, 10/31, 5-7 PM). Please consider setting up and/or donating candy. We will also pass out invitations and tracts, so there will be an opportunity to serve by putting those together. Look for flyers soon.
